results.title: Efficacy of simvastatin in reducing aortic dilatation in mouse models of abdominal aortic aneurysm.
results.text_hl: Aortic @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Arch_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001015 @@@arch@@@ @DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atheroma@@@ was substantially reduced in @GENE_LDLR @GENE_16835 @@@LDLR@@@(-/-) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ with borderline significant reduction in suprarenal aortic diameters.

citations.NLM: Golledge J, Cullen B, Moran C, Rush C. Efficacy of simvastatin in reducing aortic dilatation in mouse models of abdominal aortic aneurysm. Cardiovasc Drugs Ther. 2010 Dec;24(5-6):373-8. PMID: 20809215
citations.BibTeX: @article{20809215, title={Efficacy of simvastatin in reducing aortic dilatation in mouse models of abdominal aortic aneurysm.}, author={Golledge J and Cullen B and Moran C and Rush C}, journal={Cardiovasc Drugs Ther}, volume={24}, number={5-6}, pages={373-8}}

results.title: The combined effect of inhibiting both ACAT and HMG-CoA reductase may directly induce atherosclerotic lesion regression.
results.text_hl: With respect to lesion regression, @CHEMICAL_avasimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:C423185 @@@avasimibe@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ decreased @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Arch_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001015 @@@aortic arch lesion@@@ size by 64% and monocyte-macrophage area by 73% when compared to time zero.

citations.NLM: Bocan TM, Krause BR, Rosebury WS, Lu X, Dagle C, Bak Mueller S, Auerbach B, Sliskovic DR. The combined effect of inhibiting both ACAT and HMG-CoA reductase may directly induce atherosclerotic lesion regression. Atherosclerosis. 2001 Jul;157(1):97-105. PMID: 11427208
citations.BibTeX: @article{11427208, title={The combined effect of inhibiting both ACAT and HMG-CoA reductase may directly induce atherosclerotic lesion regression.}, author={Bocan TM and Krause BR and Rosebury WS and Lu X and Dagle C and Bak Mueller S and Auerbach B and Sliskovic DR}, journal={Atherosclerosis}, volume={157}, number={1}, pages={97-105}}
